document_data.caption: [[Wizard]]'s apprentice Mordak.
document_data.name: Mordak Brelliar
document_data.mainbody: '''Mordak Brelliar''' was the current apprentice of First Lord [[Maalthiir]], often serving in the role as his most prolific agent. Mordak believed that the powers of [[Hillsfar]] should align with the [[Zhentarim]], believing their combined power capable of reigning over the entire [[Moonsea]] region.
document_data.Appearance: It was said that Mordak resembled a younger, less charismatic version of [[Khelben Arunsun]].
document_data.History: Despite the possibilities of Mordak's ambitious scheme, his master did not share his view, not wanting to bow to [[Manshoon]] and the other Zhents. Mordak planned for years to eventually overthrow the First Lord, though the latter eventually caught wind of the plans. When the time came for Mordak to enact his treacherous coup, Maalthiir stopped his apprentice and reversed the attack. Maalthiir's powerful magics put Mordak directly under his control; among these were ''[[dominate person]]'', ''[[geas]]'', and ''[[suggestion]]''. From that time on, Mordak was unwillingly and unwaveringly faithful to his master, unable to progress by any of his own means.
